r.s: Framework for caching of arbitrary data.
r.d: With the PEAR Cache you can cache the result of certain function calls, as well as the output of a whole script run or share data between applications.
r.n: - Added Lorenzo Alberton's MDB_Container - added max_userdata_filelength as option to file container - added (optional) filelocking to file container (by dave winer) - fixes in errorchecking and garbage collection in db container
